trans-unit.source: Creates and provides information about [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] serializers.
trans-unit.target: 建立和相關資訊提供[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializerFactory"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializerFactory"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"></xref> that outputs [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content to a specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"> </xref> ，輸出[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]內容至指定的<xref:System.IO.Stream>。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The output stream that the returned serializer is to write to.
trans-unit.target: 傳回序列化程式是將寫入輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: An output writer that serializes [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content to the specified stream.
trans-unit.target: 序列化的輸出寫入器[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]內容寫入指定 stream 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the standard file name extension for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documents.
trans-unit.target: 取得標準名稱的副檔名[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]文件。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns the string ".xps".
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會傳回字串".xps"。

trans-unit.source: The standard file name extension (including the leading period) for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documents.
trans-unit.target: 標準檔案名稱副檔名 （包括前置的句點）[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the public name for the serializers that the factory produces.
trans-unit.target: 取得處理站產生的序列化程式的公用名稱。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns the string "XPS Serializer".
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會傳回字串"XPS 序列化程式 」。

trans-unit.source: The public name for serializers that the factory produces.
trans-unit.target: 處理站產生的序列化公用名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the manufacturer's name for serializers that the factory produces.
trans-unit.target: 取得處理站產生的序列化程式的製造商的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns the string "Microsoft".
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會傳回字串"Microsoft"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the manufacturer's Web address for serializers that the factory produces.
trans-unit.target: 取得處理站產生的序列化程式的製造商網址。
